docs.text: leonardo decaprio ( what's eating gilbert grape ) and claire danes ( tv's my so called life ) star in director baz luhrmann's modernized version of william shakespeare's classic , romeo & juliet .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: surrounded by a superb supporting cast , in-cluding paul sorvino ( goodfellas ) , brian dennehy ( tommy boy ) , pete poslethwaite ( the usual sus-pects ) and john leguizamo ( executive decision ) , decaprio and danes shine throughout the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story starts off at a gas station , where the " montague boys " meet the " capulet boys " and square off with one another .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: symbolizing the swords of shakespeare's day were their weapons , like the " rapier-9mm " or the " longsword- shotgun . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: instead of killing each other right away , they shoot around , just like in sword fights of old .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: another great thing about the film was the performance of harold perrineau as romeo's best friend .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mercutio , who in shakespeare's novel was quite a stud , was portrayed as an afri-can-american cross-dresser whose violent na-ture , was a definite plus .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: miriam margoyles , a virtually unknown actress was astounding as juliet's nurse , even though she was never given a name .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she was the only one who could keep juliet out of her fantasy world .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: verona was the home of the rival families in shakespeare's version , only slightly changed in luhrmann's .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now known as verona beach , the capulet's ( led by sorvino ) and montague's ( led by dennehy ) are now rival corporate dynasties .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and their small family skirmishes were now huge gang wars .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one slight problem with the film was the difficulty to comprehend the dialogue , since it was spoken in old english .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sub-titles could have helped in the beginning of the movie , but toward the end , it became easier to understand .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this excellent movie poses another prob-lem : what genre is it ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: romeo & juliet contains so much drama , yet enough comedy and action to be placed in either of those categories .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with the same award-winning formula that was used by quentin tarantino in reservoir dogs and pulp fiction , romeo & juliet is a sure fire modern masterpiece .
docs.label: positive
